entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:24 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 10:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 5:59 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
